Title: Camdoodle
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Doodling application. For kids.

The project started as a showcase for new Silverlight 4 features, wrapped in Silverlight/Expression behaviors.
See http://www.silverlightshow.net/items/Camdoodle-showcasing-Silverlight-4-new-features-as-behaviors.aspx for more details.

See the application in action (Silverlight 4 required) http://tozon.info/sl/camdoodle
